text.div:
Below codes are subset of security label. Current C2S supports the below four codes for segmentation.

This is a subset of v3 Act code value sets, and more value sets may be added later. This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Includes subset of the codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode
ETHsubstance abuse information sensitivity
HIVHIV/AIDS information sensitivity
PSYpsychiatry information sensitivity
SEXsexuality and reproductive health information sensitivity

name: v3 Actcodes
description: A code specifying the particular kind of Act that the Act-instance represents within its class

concept.display: sexuality and reproductive health information sensitivity
